release-notes: • bugfix: fixed default body to message.payload() for REST client and method POST.
• bugfix: fixed wrong path computed when base path is '/' and listener path starts with '/' as well, e.g: /resource.

• bugfix: missing check for null styles and parameter locations in OpenAPI HeaderObject, ParameterObject and SecuritySchemeObject.
  • bugfix: avoid removing route definition if the route could have not been added due to previous errors during startup.
• bugfix: OpenAPI ServerObject was published with leading '/' slash, causing issue during the import process in other software. It has been fixed to NOT include the leading '/' slash.
• bugfix: RESTListener route matching did not prioritize routes with exact match.
